name: Roots (Adikowsky, Mults, Pro-noobster (Andrew Demchenko))
description:
Easy to learn and hard to master, "Roots" challenges players to act as a plant trying to create its roots. Find resources in the soil, and use them efficiently to further expand your underground network.

The game begins with one root from which the player can branch out in 5 directions, up to two times. Select the direction you want to branch in to create a new root. In the soil, there are both resources and obstacles. Reach the precious materials without bumping into rocks. Try to survive as long as you can before your supplies run out!
